summary: THE VATS TRICK WORKS TOO HELLWOLF06
descriptionHtml:
I made this mod while in an argument on the internet and made this to win it.
It disabled ranged killcams which can be obtained a different way

If you add these lines to your skyrim.ini you don't need this mod.
[VATS]
bVATSDisable=1

FAQ
Q: Is this compatible with SkyRe?
A: For now it is, I might remove that fact later

Q: Why is there no endorse button?
A: If one line of code got heavily endorsed I'd feel bad.

Q: Is this compatible with Dance of Death?
A: Probably not, I didn't test this mod at all

Q: You didn't test this mod? Whats the worst that can happen?
A: The worst that can happen is this mod doesn't work and you either always or never get a ranged kill cam.

Q: Did you make up these questions?
A: I'm a very lonely person.
author: Tai
